review:
This movie was from the heart.Watched it when i was in 10th standard and have been a fan of shahid kapoor since then.
It is a family movie,full of comedy,bit of action and full on entertainer.
Shahid kapoor has rocked the acting,he is really great in this movie,doing something different and the songs are really great.
Do watch this movie now  even if you skipped it earlier,you won't be dissapointed and feel this movie relatable.

Rating:8/10.

Storyline direction presentation was very nice. It's about relationship between mother and a son. Her mother wish was that she wanted to see him as a well known police inspector.  ‚ò∫Ô∏èüëçNice movie.

The storyline was an old one, a wannabe policeman, mother-son relationship, kidnapping, don- the father.
It had all the masala that is needed for entertainment.
All in all a good movie.
This movie is a movie worth watching with everyone in the family. Watching this movie will awaken the love of the mother for the child and the devotion for the mother in the child.

Very interesting movie & and all full comedy & shahid sir of acting is great.
